SEARCH
Package org.polimi.servernetwork.controller

Class UsernameIssuer

java.lang.Object
org.polimi.servernetwork.controller.UsernameIssuer
public class UsernameIssuer extends Object
this class uses a map where the key is the username and value is an array of 3 objects index 0 connection status of the player index 1 the gameCode index 2 the clientHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • UsernameIssuer

      public UsernameIssuer()
      constructor, initializes the map

  • Method Details

    • setClientHandler

      public void setClientHandler(ClientHandler clientHandler, String username)
      associates a client handler to a username. in case the username is not registered it throws an exception
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the client handler to be associated
      username - the username of the client handler

    • removeUsername

      public void removeUsername(String username) throws NoSuchElementException
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException

    • login

      public InternalComunication login(String username)
      if username is not in the data structure the method stores a line for the new player with connection status CONNECTED and no other attributes and responds OK. if the username is present, either is currently connected or is disconnected. In the first case the method returns ALREADY_TAKEN_USERNAME, in the second case RECONNECTION.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player that is connecting
      Returns:
      return an InternalComunication that explains what to do

    • getClientHandler

      public ClientHandler getClientHandler(String username)
